CustomField.description: The number of days before a Request deadline that an escalation notification will be sent to the Account/Reference Owner's manager.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of days before a Request deadline that an escalation notification will be sent to the Account/Reference Owner's manager. A second reminder will also go to the Account/Reference Owner and Requester.
